title: I need 1 RP please!
body:
The new hextech crafting came out and a key costs 125 RP i happen to have 124 RP! Can I please get 1rp riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

- BlueHydra OCE

replies.body: Send you league of legends art work to support <3 they love seeing what we come up with ;)

* They do sometimes, but there are a few things you should know.

* Go through support with this, you can open a ticket [HERE.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)

* There is no guarantee they will agree, Riot has no obligation to give you anything.

* You will have a much better chance if you submit a piece of artwork or a poem or something along with the request (anything you have created that's LoL related). 

Note: This is a one time deal

Good luck ♥
